* As substrate for the kinase reaction the biotinyiated peptide biotin-KVEKIGEGTYGW (C-terminus in amid form) was used which can be purchased e.g. form the company Biosynthan GmbH (Berlin-Buch, Germany) with a concentration of 2 μΜ => final cone, in the 5 μΙ_ assay volume is 1 .2 μΜ.
